module.name: sellingpricerule
module.displayName: Selling price rule based on purchase price
module.description: This module lets you define sales prices calculated from the purchase price for a group of customers. This is ideal if you wish to sell to reseller customers by simply applying a percentage to the purchase price.
module.author: Piment Bleu
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall?
